pullrequest.title: Use matrix job to build all brew bottle flavours in one job

content.raw:
The artifacts were copied but instead of using just the destination directory they are using subdirectories inside it. I made [8eae4f0](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/8eae4f0cfbeebb0eb4501f6d6f45886bb4a434f4?at=default) and [55afa01](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/55afa01b37f3fc8a54383a9ed2661a346ef3ae6b?at=default) so the hash updater and the repository uploader can find them in subdirectories.

Tested:

* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew\_pr\_bottle\_hash\_updater/577](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pr_bottle_hash_updater/577/console)
* [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/repository\_uploader\_ng/5952/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/repository_uploader_ng/5952/)
